thread.title: Body found hidden behind closet wall believed to be missing Manchester woman
thread.title_full: Body found hidden behind closet wall believed to be missing Manchester woman

title: Body found hidden behind closet wall believed to be missing Manchester woman
text:
Body found hidden behind closet wall believed to be missing Manchester woman 
By KATHRYN MARCHOCKI 
Staff Writer 
MANCHESTER - The body of a decomposed female found concealed in a hidden crawl space inside a city apartment Sunday night is believed to belong to a 57-year-old woman who has been missing since Sept. 20, authorities said Monday. 
Manchester police and firefighters went to Sue Hutchinson's 169A Calef Rd. apartment Sunday night for a report of a strange odor in the building. Hutchinson's relatives noticed the smell, officials said. ... Subscribe or log in to read more Please sign up for as low as 36 cents per day to continue viewing our website.

MANCHESTER - The body of a decomposed female found concealed in a hidden crawl space inside a city apartment Sunday night is believed to belong to a 57-year-old woman who has been missing since Sept. 20, authorities said Monday. 
Manchester police and firefighters went to Sue Hutchinson's 169A Calef Rd. apartment Sunday night for a report of a strange odor in the building. Hutchinson's relatives noticed the smell, officials said. 
Hutchinson has been missing since Sept. 20. 
After searching various areas of the building, detectives located a crawl space hidden behind a false wall inside a closet in her apartment, officials said. They removed the wall panel and found an adult female's body hidden inside. 
New Hampshire Attorney General Joe Foster and Manchester police believe the body to be that of Hutchinson. 
Hutchinson's roommate, Stephen Andrade, 36, also disappeared about the same time last month. 
Andrade killed himself in a Massachusetts motel on Oct. 6. Based on statements Andrade made shortly before he killed himself, officials said it appears likely he killed Hutchinson, hid her body and fled. 
An autopsy will be done on Hutchinson's body on Tuesday. A definitive identification is expected at that time. Top Jobs
